name: Lego Racers
description:
Wine version for the retail cd version.
You will need the original game cd for this.
content:
game:
  args: -novideo
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/LEGO Media/Games/LEGO Racers/LEGORacers.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    message: Insert disc
    requires: Setup.exe
- merge:
    description: Copying disc to cache
    dst: $CACHE/cdrom
    src: $DISC
- task:
    executable: $CACHE/cdrom/Setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
